text:
I'm going to explain the evolution of television in the 20's century. In fact, the first television has been seen in Paris for the first time with Alex Dupont in 1926. But actually, the democratization especially in Paris arrived in the middle of the 20's century. This new equipment was a révélant difference between all the society class. Because, at the beginning it was for rich family. When all the menage were able to buy television, the audience exploded. However, this invention has been reunited but yet today people around the world or during an events in their own country. The fact that family can watch tv journal and movies or something else has reduced the press paper and cinema. In addition, this invention was the pioneer in new communication method. But this new area of communication are in decline because of the massive explosion of internet and some of the platform associated like Netflix, YouTube... Indeed, this decline mark the end of a century where family owned only one television in their living-room and where they were reunited for only one program. This new situation can make some of the old people nostalgic of this part because they were together. Beside this fact, leaders of television program to faced this decline are in constant reflection to innovate their program. Many of this leaders, produce tv reality show that make a higher audimat that simple movies or information.
 I hope that television will never be abandoned because of the positive impact in  our society. Being able to reunited people with a program is such a great invention. The event like Olympic game, the crowning of the queen or something else are things that need to stay in mind. I'm a television user and I believe that we could be better for the protection of this incredible invention. Finally, all the invention are in a cycle boucl because television reduced press paper but internet also reduced television
